argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mattposcl.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | mattposcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_matbas2i | |- ( M e. B -> M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) -> M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_tposf | |- ( M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) -> tpos M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_3syl | |- ( M e. B -> tpos M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 9 | 1, 2 | #P_matrcl | |- ( M e. B -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simpld | |- ( M e. B -> N e. Fin ) |
| 11 |  | #P_xpfi | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) -> ( N X. N ) e. Fin ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_anidms | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( N X. N ) e. Fin ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. B -> ( N X. N ) e. Fin ) |
| 14 |  | #P_elmapg | |- ( ( ( Base ` R ) e. _V /\ ( N X. N ) e. Fin ) -> ( tpos M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) <-> tpos M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 13, 14 | #P_sylancr | |- ( M e. B -> ( tpos M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) <-> tpos M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 15 | #P_mpbird | |- ( M e. B -> tpos M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 3 | #P_matbas2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) -> ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 18 | 9, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. B -> ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 19 | 18, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( M e. B -> ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) = B ) |
| 20 | 16, 19 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( M e. B -> tpos M e. B ) |
